title: Scrub Meadow
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. The grasses range in height from less than a meter to nearly two meters tall in places. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. The land is gently sloped up to the north, gently sloped down to the east, gently sloped up to the south, flat to the west.
